DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether low calorie , low glycemic index diet omega-3 fatty acid supplement prevent negative consequence sleep deprivation .
DOC.brief_title: A Change Diet May Decrease Negative Consequences Chronic Sleep Deprivation
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot study include 18 medical resident two academic medical center New York City . All resident participate study assign work night shift schedule two week , begin study morning prior first even shift . The study subject randomly assign one two group : - Intervention diet -- consist 40 % carbohydrate , 30 % protein , 30 % fat 2.4g long chain fatty acid supplement ( n=9 ) Total calorie males 1600/day , 1200/day female - Control group -- ad lib diet . Main outcome measure include : - weight - rest metabolic rate - percent body fat - lipid profile - CRP - fast glucose insulin level - urinary neurotransmitter level - salivary cortisol - six cognitive test memory , attention , executive function . Subjects test day 1 , 7 , 14 study .
DOC.criteria: Medical resident good standing Cabrini Medical Center Saint Vincent 's Hospital , NY . Must schedule two consecutive week night shift work . Febrile illness Smoker Food allergy kind Taking prescription medication History diabetes thyroid dysfunction Body mass index ( BMI ) > 30 Pregnancy
